The researcher, I was guided by him, was a gift that was simplified for him, and the prestige of the woman, so I died on him, my grace and money, and their meeting is the kinam when the people of the world, and the people of the world, And the end of it, and it is permissible for it for the simplicity of money and the prestige, and there was a lot of wealth and the fresh state of his condition in the eyes, an aorge and an informant who dubbed the Rahani.Likewise, they were nicknamed it by alleviating the meaning of the alienation by the achievement of the righteousness.On the authority of Ibn Abbas, I extended to him what is between the Yemeni to the Levant.And on the authority of Mujahid, I was paid to him, some of him, as well as the bed was paved.
